ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] hi all
ygData.msgSnippet: It sounds like you are trying to solo. I am no expert nor do I have a char that high but I have read in numerous places that once you get high in level you
ygData.messageBody:
It sounds like you are trying to solo. I am no expert
nor do I have a char that high but I have read in
numerous places that once you get high in level you
need to group when hunting. 5 Level 54 people should
do alright, I would imagine.

Hope this helps

--- perth6065 <perth6065@...> wrote:
> Hi all im new here so thought id say a big hello
